author: kingpanther13
releaseNotes:
v0.4.1 - Hub Admin Read/Write Tools with Hub Security support:

NEW FEATURES:
- Hub Admin Read Tools (8 new tools): get_hub_details, list_hub_apps, list_hub_drivers, get_zwave_details, get_zigbee_details, get_hub_health, get_app_source, get_driver_source
- Hub Admin Write Tools (10 new tools): create_hub_backup, reboot_hub, shutdown_hub, zwave_repair, install_app, install_driver, update_app_code, update_driver_code, delete_app, delete_driver
- Hub Security authentication support (works with and without Hub Security enabled)
- UI toggles: Enable/disable Hub Admin Read and Write access independently
- Mandatory backup enforcement: Write tools require a recent backup before execution
- Robust safety prompts: Write tool descriptions mandate backup + user confirmation

HUB ADMIN READ TOOLS:
- get_hub_details: Extended hub info (firmware, model, memory, temperature, database size, radio info)
- list_hub_apps: List all user-installed apps on the hub (uses /hub2/userAppTypes endpoint)
- list_hub_drivers: List all user-installed drivers on the hub (uses /hub2/userDeviceTypes endpoint)
- get_zwave_details: Z-Wave radio info, firmware, device table
- get_zigbee_details: Zigbee radio info, channel, PAN ID, device details
- get_hub_health: Health metrics with warnings for low memory, high temp, large database
- get_app_source: Retrieve the Groovy source code of an installed app by ID
- get_driver_source: Retrieve the Groovy source code of an installed driver by ID

HUB ADMIN WRITE TOOLS:
- create_hub_backup: Create hub database backup (MUST be called before any other write tool)
- reboot_hub: Reboot the hub (requires backup + user confirmation)
- shutdown_hub: Shut down the hub (requires backup + user confirmation + warns about manual restart)
- zwave_repair: Start Z-Wave network repair (requires backup + user confirmation)
- install_app: Install a new Groovy app from source code (requires backup + user confirmation)
- install_driver: Install a new Groovy driver from source code (requires backup + user confirmation)
- update_app_code: Update an existing app's source code with optimistic locking (requires backup + user confirmation)
- update_driver_code: Update an existing driver's source code with optimistic locking (requires backup + user confirmation)
- delete_app: Permanently delete an installed app (requires backup + user confirmation)
- delete_driver: Permanently delete an installed driver (requires backup + user confirmation)

SAFETY FEATURES:
- Hub Admin Read and Write are both OFF by default
- Write tools check for a backup created within the last hour
- Write tool descriptions contain mandatory pre-flight checklists
- Write tools require explicit confirm=true parameter
- Hub Security cookie caching with 30-minute expiry
- Graceful fallbacks when internal API endpoints are unavailable

Total MCP tools: 52 (was 34 in v0.3.0)
